name: Swoop (itch) (DVNC Tech)
description:
Generations upon generations have passed since Prometheus stole the sacred flame from Zeus, brought it to the mortal world which helped them thrive, and then sentenced to endless suffering. But after a power struggle between the Pantheon of Gods and thriving mortals, the Gods took back the flame, leaving the mortal realm to fade into husks of their former selves.

Light the flame of humanity and bring hope to human settlements in a desolate world.

Sarah Magno - Writing
Jordan Riley - Writing
Matt McDermott - Music
Ameya Vinayaraj - Writing
Brooke Elowe - Sound Effects (to be added)
Lilly Joyce - Testing
Vince Quarles - Programming
Nicholas Leffler - Art
